title: DDFP 382: Cousins vs RGIII & Andrew Luck
itunes:title: DDFP 382: Cousins vs RGIII & Andrew Luck
description:
Shek is joined by Maurice Jones-Drew, Ike Taylor and Handsome Hank to dissect the Redskins decision to start Kirk Cousins over RGIII. The guys then list their dream Super Bowl 50 matchups. Lastly, Shek goes one on one with Indianapolis Colts quarterback Andrew Luck on his name, beard, favorite movie and more. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
